quotes.text: Every chess master was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Irving Chernev

quotes.text: Chess is a war over the board. The object is to crush the opponent’s mind.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.text: Chess is the struggle against the error.
quotes.author: Johannes Zukertort

quotes.text: Chess is the gymnasium of the mind.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Even the laziest King flees wildly in the face of a double check!
quotes.author: Aaron Nimzowitsch

quotes.text: We cannot resist the fascination of sacrifice, since a passion for sacrifices is part of a Chess player's nature.
quotes.author: Rudolf Spielman

quotes.text: Nothing excites jaded Grandmasters more than a theoretical novelty.
quotes.author: Dominic Lawson

quotes.text: A win by an unsound combination, however showy, fills me with artistic horror
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.text: Only the player with the initiative has the right to attack
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.text: Chess is rarely a game of ideal moves. Almost always, a player faces a series of difficult consequences whichever move he makes.
quotes.author: David Shenk

quotes.text: When you see a good move, look for a better one.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.text: Half the variations which are calculated in a tournament game turn out to be completely superfluous. Unfortunately, no one knows in advance which half.
quotes.author: Jan Timman

quotes.text: Even a poor plan is better than no plan at all.
quotes.author: Mikhail Chigorin

quotes.text: Tactics is knowing what to do when there is something to do; strategy is knowing what to do when there is nothing to do.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.text: In life, as in chess, forethought wins.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.text: You may learn much more from a game you lose than from a game you win. You will have to lose hundreds of games before becoming a good player.
quotes.author: José Raúl Capablanca

quotes.text: I don’t believe in psychology. I believe in good moves.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.text: Play the opening like a book, the middlegame like a magician, and the endgame like a machine.
quotes.author: Rudolph Spielmann

quotes.text: I used to attack because it was the only thing I knew. Now I attack because I know it works best.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.text: It’s always better to sacrifice your opponent’s men.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.text: One doesn’t have to play well, it’s enough to play better than your opponent.
quotes.author: Siegbert Tarrasch

quotes.text: Up to this point, White has been following well-known analysis. But now he makes a fatal error: he begins to use his own head.
quotes.author: Siegbert Tarrasch

quotes.text: Of chess, it has been said that life is not long enough for it, but that is the fault of life, not chess.
quotes.author: William Napier

quotes.text: Chess is beautiful enough to waste your life for.
quotes.author: Hans Ree

quotes.text: A chess game in progress is… a cosmos unto itself, fully insulated from an infant’s cry, an erotic invitation, or war.
quotes.author: David Shenk

quotes.text: It will be cheering to know that many people are skillful chess players, though in many instances their brains, in a general way, compare unfavorably with the cognitive faculties of a rabbit.
quotes.author: James Mortimer

quotes.text: The pin is mightier than the sword.
quotes.author: Fred Reinfeld

quotes.text: The only thing chess players have in common is chess.
quotes.author: Lodewijk Prins

quotes.text: Those who say they understand chess, understand nothing.
quotes.author: Robert Hübner

quotes.text: One bad move nullifies forty good ones.
quotes.author: Bernhard Horwitz

quotes.text: If your opponent offers you a draw, try to work out why he thinks he’s worse off.
quotes.author: Nigel Short

quotes.text: Your body has to be in top condition. Your chess deteriorates as your body does. You can’t separate body and mind.
quotes.author: Bobby Fisher

quotes.text: The hardest game to win is a won game
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.text: Chess is not for timid souls.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.text: Chess is a forcing house where the fruits of character can ripen more fully than in life.
quotes.author: Edward Morgan Forster

quotes.text: A king may be the most important piece on the chessboard; however, the queen is the most powerful.
quotes.author: Karim R. Ellis

quotes.text: To venture an opinion is like moving a piece at chess: it may be taken, but it forms the beginning of a game that is won.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: It is no easy matter to reply correctly to [Emanuel] Lasker's bad moves.
quotes.author: W.H.K. Pollock

quotes.text: For in the idea of chess and the development of the chess mind we have a picture of the intellectual struggle of mankind.
quotes.author: Richard Réti

quotes.text: Chess, like love, is infectious at any age.
quotes.author: Salo Flohr
